description: Gets the alerts for a single monitoring schedule.

parameters.name: MonitoringScheduleName
parameters.description: The name of a monitoring schedule.

nested_items.name: MonitoringAlertSummaries
nested_items.description: A JSON array where each element is a summary for a monitoring alert.

nested_items.name: MonitoringAlertName
nested_items.description: The name of a monitoring alert.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that indicates when a monitor alert was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: A timestamp that indicates when a monitor alert was last updated.

nested_items.name: AlertStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of an alert.

nested_items.name: DatapointsToAlert
nested_items.description: Within EvaluationPeriod, how many execution failures will raise an alert.

nested_items.name: EvaluationPeriod
nested_items.description: The number of most recent monitoring executions to consider when evaluating alert status.

nested_items.name: ModelDashboardIndicator
nested_items.description: An alert action taken to light up an icon on the Model Dashboard when an alert goes into InAlert status.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the alert action is turned on.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the response is truncated, SageMaker returns this token. To retrieve the next set of alerts, use it in the subsequent request.
